type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="siteTag" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="territoryCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="language" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="orderReference" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="placedDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="orderProperties" type="tns:orderProperties"/> <xs:element name="statusLabel" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="territoryCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="totalDiscount" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="totalPrice" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="totalTax" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="totalWeight" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderProperties"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderProperty" type="tns:property"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="property"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderPackages"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderPackage" type="tns:orderPackage"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderPackage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="bundleReference" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="discount" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="discountType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="offeringId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="packageItems" type="tns:packageItems"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quantity" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="tax" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="weight" type="xs:decimal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="packageItems"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="packageItem" type="tns:packageItem"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="packageItem"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="productDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="productId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="itemProperties" type="tns:packageItemProperties"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="quantityUnitId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="tax" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="taxRate" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="packageItemProperties"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="itemProperty" type="tns:property"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderAddresses"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderAddress" type="tns:orderAddress"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderAddress"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="city" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="line1" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="line2" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postcode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="region" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="territoryCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderComments"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderComment" type="tns:orderComment"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderComment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="comment" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createOrderResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="orderId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="createOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createOrder"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="createOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="OrderProcessingServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:OrderProcessing"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:accessTokenResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="accessTokenResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="expiresIn" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="idToken" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="notBeforePolicy" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="refreshExpiresIn" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="refreshToken" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sessionState" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="token" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenType" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="GenericSoapFault" type="tns:GenericSoapFault"/> <xs:complexType name="GenericSoapFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="VerificationException" type="tns:VerificationException"/> <xs:complexType name="VerificationException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="isTokenActive"> con:request.name: CreateOrder
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sei="http://sei.ws.oms.brandpath.com/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sei:createOrder> <authentication> <channelTag>ONLINE</channelTag> <clientTag>BRANDPATH</clientTag> <siteTag>MICROSITE</siteTag> <territoryCode>ROU</territoryCode> </authentication> <order> <language>RO</language> <orderReference>test</orderReference> <customerOrderReference>testCustomer</customerOrderReference> <placedDate>${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS").format(new Date())}</placedDate> <orderProperties> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderProperty> <name>FIRSTNAME</name> <value>${#firstName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>MIDDLENAME</name> <value>test12</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>LASTNAME</name> <value>${#lastName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>TITLE</name> <value>${#title}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PHONENUMBER</name> <value>777test31</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>EMAIL</name> <value>test4sss2@ccc.ro</value> </orderProperty> </orderProperties> <totalDiscount>1.43</totalDiscount> <totalPrice>${totalPrice}</totalPrice> <totalTax>21.44</totalTax> <totalWeight>1.89</totalWeight> <type>CONTRACT</type> </order> <orderPackages>${OrderPackages}</orderPackages> <orderAddresses> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderAddress> <city>${#city}</city> <line1>43 High Street</line1> <!--Optional:--> <line2>Corner building</line2> <!--Optional:--> <postcode>${postcode}</postcode> <!--Optional:--> <region>Bucks</region> <territoryCode>ROU</territoryCode> <type>BILLING</type> </orderAddress> </orderAddresses> <!--Optional:--> <orderComments> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderComment> <comment>YES Comment!</comment> <type>POSITIVE</type> </orderComment> </orderComments> </sei:createOrder> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.script:
//Tip to generate a random element from an array def myTestCase = context.testCase def firstNames = ["Lena","Zuzanna","Julia","Maja","Hanna","Aleksandra","Amelia","Jakub","Kacper","Antoni","Filip","Jan","Szymon","Franciszek","Micha","Oliver","Jack","Charlie","Harry","Oscar","Thomas","Jacob","Ethan","Noah"] def lastNames = ["Smith","Jones","Williams","Taylor","Brown","Davies","Evans","Wilson","Craven","Johnson","Robinson","Thompson","Wright","Walker","White","Edwards","Hughes","Green","Hall", "Maecki","Maj","Sowa","Milewski","Gajda","Klimek","Olejniczak","Ratajczak","Romanowski","Matuszewski"] def titles = ["Mr","Mrs","Ms","Miss","Dr"] def cities = ["Bath","Birmingham","Bradford","Brighton & Hove","Bristol","Cambridge","Canterbury","Carlisle","Chelmsford","Chester","Chichester","Coventry","Derby","Durham","Ely","Exeter","Gloucester","Hereford","Kingston upon packageItems = ["<packageItem><price>24.45</price><productDescription>asdas</productDescription><productId>3</productId><itemProperties><itemProperty><name>WEIGHT</name><value>12.34</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>bla</name><value>asdsad</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>Blue</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>White</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>PIECES</name><value>3</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>LENGTH</name><value>8</value></itemProperty></itemProperties><quantity>4</quantity><quantityUnitId>2</quantityUnitId><tax>0.4</tax><taxRate>2</taxRate><type>HANDSET</type></packageItem>","<packageItem><price>24.45</price><productDescription>asdas</productDescription><productId>3</productId><itemProperties><itemProperty><name>WEIGHT</name><value>12.34</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>bla</name><value>asdsad</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>Blue</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>White</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>PIECES</name><value>3</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>LENGTH</name><value>8</value></itemProperty></itemProperties><quantity>4</quantity><quantityUnitId>2</quantityUnitId><tax>0.4</tax><taxRate>2</taxRate><type>HANDSET</type></packageItem><packageItem><price>24.45</price><productDescription>asdas</productDescription><productId>3</productId><itemProperties><itemProperty><name>WEIGHT</name><value>12.34</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>bla</name><value>asdsad</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>Blue</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>COLOR</name><value>White</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>PIECES</name><value>3</value></itemProperty><itemProperty><name>LENGTH</name><value>8</value></itemProperty></itemProperties><quantity>4</quantity><quantityUnitId>2</quantityUnitId><tax>0.4</tax><taxRate>2</taxRate><type>HANDSET</type></packageItem>","<packageItem><price>24.45</ random = new Random() propTestStep = myTestCase.getTestStepByName("CreateOrder Properties") // get the Property TestStep propTestStep.setPropertyValue("firstName", firstNames[random.nextInt(24)].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("lastName", lastNames[random.nextInt(29)].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("title", titles[random.nextInt(5)].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("city", cities[random.nextInt(51)].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packageItems", packageItems[random.nextInt(3)].toString()) log.info firstNames[random.nextInt(24)] log.info lastNames[random.nextInt(29)] log.info titles[random.nextInt(5)] log.info cities[random.nextInt(51)] log.info packageItems[random.nextInt(3)]
def sampleMap = ["Mr","Mrs","Ms","Miss","Dr"] assert sampleMap[0..4] // We can use ranges. log.info sampleMap

con:request.name: CreateOrder
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sei="http://sei.ws.oms.brandpath.com/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sei:createOrder> <authentication> <channelTag>ONLINE</channelTag> <clientTag>BRANDPATH</clientTag> <siteTag>MICROSITE</siteTag> <territoryCode>ROU</territoryCode> </authentication> <orderHeader> <language>RO</language> <orderReference>test</orderReference> <customerOrderReference>testCustomer</customerOrderReference> <placedDate>${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS").format(new Date())}</placedDate> <orderProperties> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderProperty> <name>FIRSTNAME</name> <value>${#firstName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>MIDDLENAME</name> <value>test12</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>LASTNAME</name> <value>${#lastName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>TITLE</name> <value>${#title}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PHONENUMBER</name> <value>777test31</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>EMAIL</name> <value>test4sss2@ccc.ro</value> </orderProperty> </orderProperties> <statusTag>AWAITING_APPROVAL</statusTag> <totalDiscount>1.43</totalDiscount> <totalPrice>100.45</totalPrice> <totalTax>21.44</totalTax> <totalWeight>1.89</totalWeight> <type>STDDELIVERY</type> </orderHeader> <orderPackages> <orderPackage> <bundleReference>asda</bundleReference> <discount>1.2</discount> <discountType>bgdbgd</discountType> <!--Optional:--> <offeringId>asdas</offeringId> <packageItems>${packageItems}</packageItems> <price>20</price> <!--Optional:--> <quantity>1</quantity> <tax>33</tax> <!--Optional:--> <weight>7</weight> </orderPackage> </orderPackages> <orderAddresses> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderAddress> <city>${#city}</city> <line1>43 High Street</line1> <!--Optional:--> <line2>Corner building</line2> <!--Optional:--> <postcode>${postcode}</postcode> <!--Optional:--> <region>Bucks</region> <territoryCode>ROU</territoryCode> <type>BILLING</type> </orderAddress> </orderAddresses> <!--Optional:--> <orderComments> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderComment> <comment>YES Comment!</comment> <type>POSITIVE</type> </orderComment> </orderComments> </sei:createOrder> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
